name: Wraith (itch) (ShardStudio)
description:
Welcome to wraith, a simple but high action paced game where you play as "wraith", using enemies to complete complex puzzles in a 2d underworld forest.

(Use 'esc' to return to the menu at any time)

This game was made for the Bonfire GameJam!

Developers twitters: @Voxelpixeldev  @tomidev1
